Background

I’m a Graduate Student in Computer Science at The George Washington University (SEAS), graduating in December 2025. Passionate about software engineering, AI, and web development, I’m seeking Summer 2025 internships and full-time roles to create impactful solutions.
After earning my undergraduate degree, I worked as a Software Engineer at Scalex Technology Solutions LLP for two years, where I developed scalable applications and gained hands-on experience in full-stack development and cloud technologies. With experience in hackathons, full-stack projects, and scalable applications, I thrive at the intersection of code and creativity.

When I'm not in front of a computer screen, I'm probably sleeping, binge-watching my favorite shows, or crossing off another item on my bucket list.

Projects
Anime Character Detection

Developed a computer vision pipeline with Google Cloud Vision API to detect and count anime characters across 500+ video scenes, identifying crowded scenes with 85% accuracy. Visualized results using Matplotlib, applying CV techniques to creative media analysis.

Python Google Cloud Vision API Matplotlib VS Code
The Magic Behind Autostereograms

Built a Python system to create 100+ custom autostereograms by encoding depth maps into 3D stereoscopic images, leveraging computational graphics. Explored human perception, generating optical illusions from simple patterns in under 5 seconds per image.

Python Numpy NIP VS Code
